Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Seriously. I have an extra-large t-shirt that fits THE SAME as my size small t-shirts. I have a pair of leggings that fit well and silly me thought I could then reasonably order other leggings from that brand in the same size. Apparently this was a faulty conjecture. THE SAME BRAND I TELL YOU. And this is *with* using the waist/hip measurements they provide on the website.  I just have zero idea what to even expect anymore. It turns all shopping into some hellish emotional roller-coaster.

Author: bongshelter
Text: It helps (somewhat) to remember that clothing sizes have no real meaning. (even when it involves measurements! WTF) This has nothing to do with you, it's something everyone has to suffer through.
